usbpowerd(8) System Manager's Manual usbpowerd(8)

NAME

usbpowerd — Daemon to detect and manage Apple Extra Power Protocol for USB devices

DESCRIPTION

Use launchctl(1) to control usbpowerd

FILES

/System/Library/LaunchDaemons/com.apple.usbpowerd.plist
 
/System/Library/Sandbox/Profiles/com.apple.usbpowerd.sb
 

SEE ALSO

launchd(1) launchctl(1)
